basics.name: Khadyothan Choudari Dasari
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Software Engineer with a passion for developing scalable and efficient software solutions. I have experience in building full-stack web applications, microservices, and RESTful APIs. I am proficient in Java, Python, JavaScript, and SQL. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Arizona State University.

work.name: Intelligent Data Infrastructure Lab, Arizona State University
work.summary: Research and implement consistency mechanisms in distributed LSM-based key-value store systems (RocksDB), enabling secondary read instances to access un-flushed in-memory writes from primary instances.

work.name: MedCuore Medical Solutions Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Developed and deployed Machine Learning models for anomaly detection on the Air Quality Monitoring team and automated data processing pipelines to streamline visualization and detection processes.
highlights: Apache Kafka, Python, PyTorch, Docker, Kubernetes

work.name: Pianalytix Edutech Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Developed course module interfaces using React, Redux, and GraphQL and shipped React components used by 10000+ users. Build RESTful APIs for processing video engagement metrics and implemented CI/CD pipeline to containerize front-end services.
highlights: React, Redux, GraphQL, Java Spring Boot, Docker, Jenkins

education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Sri City

projects.name: Graph Data Processing Pipeline
projects.summary: Developed a real-time data ingestion pipeline to feed NYC cab trip data (150+ locations, 5000+ trips) into Kafka and a distributed Neo4j cluster, executing PageRank and BFS for advanced graph insights.
highlights: Apache Kafka, Neo4j, MiniKube, Kubernetes, Docker

projects.name: Image Recognition as a Service
projects.summary: Architected an on-demand, auto scaling application on AWS to handle 1000+ concurrent image-classification requests in under 60 seconds, comparing a custom EC2-based scaling solution against a serverless Lambda.
highlights: JavaScript, AWS Lambda, EC2, S3, API Gateway

projects.name: RAG Application for Arxiv Papers
projects.summary: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application for academic papers using Faiss, RocksDB, Llama2, incorporating advanced chunking and re-ranking strategies to enhance retrieval accuracy and response quality.

projects.name: Image Vector Database
projects.summary: Developed an image search framework using the Caltech101 dataset, and implemented dimensionality reduction techniques like SVD, NNMF and CP to compare and enhance search performance on latent features. Implemented a locality sensitive hash and refined results using an SVM based user relevance feedback system
highlights: Recommendations, PageRank, SVM, SVD, NNMF, CP

volunteer.organization: Student Development Council, Indian Institute of Information Technology, Sri City
volunteer.summary: Organized and managed institute events, clubs, and activities by collaborating with board members and student council members.
